title: ELIM Black LF D5+ Mid
body:
[ELIM Gaming](http://elimgaming.org/) is looking for for a D5+ Mid laner to be on the starting roster for ELIM Black. ELIM Black is run as a serious team with a competitive mentality. We generally have 1-2 analysts viewing our practices which currently are run from Monday-Thursday from 7:30pm-10:30(ish)pm AEST. Being part of the ELIM organisation provides benefits such as: having a sister team (ELIM White) to scrim against, analysts to help improve your play, and  fees for tournament entries and name changes covered.

**Requirements:**
- Diamond 5+ soloq ranking (exceptions can be made for high level platinum players who show a passion for improvement)
- Diverse champion pool
- Strong communication skills
- Ranked 5s experience
- A headset with a clear microphone
- Teamspeak 3
- Availability from Monday-Thursday, 7:30pm-10:30pm AEST (as well as some weekends, for tournaments)
- A willingness to accept and provide constructive criticism
- Name-change to ELIM tag (the cost of the change will be paid for by the organisation)


**If interested, add "ELIM ThePinch" ingame or email Charliewraith@outlook.com**

replies.body:
This is counter strike all over again.

Duds getting good sponserships and having things paid for them and they do not even understand the system they used to get there.
